Detailed Description

This class allows you to blend between two BaseNodeInfos.

void BlendNodeInfo::getTrackedDirection ( Vector3 &  direction  )  [virtual]

This method accepts a direction vector and updates it to the current direction of the manipulated bipeds.

It uses the pointing node as the reference. If no pointing node is defined, it attempts to use the scene root for the model instead.

Parameters:
direction This vector is the result of the calculation.

Implements BaseNodeInfo.

bool BlendNodeInfo::isPrimaryNodeAnimated (  )  [virtual]

This method returns whether or not the primary node has been animated or not.

Returns:
true if node is animated, false otherwise.

Implements BaseNodeInfo.

const Vector3 &  dirInWS,
const float  weighting = 1.0f 
) [virtual]

This method applies transforms so that nodes look at the specified vector.
